bibl.title: P. Oxy. 840: Amulet or Miniature Codex?
bibl.note: P. Oxy. V, 840 (= van Haelst 585). - I. Amulets. - II. Miniature Codices. - III. Summary. It seems evident that the document was created to be a miniature codex and not an amulet. It cannot speak about how it may have been used by various owners.
